name: Flower
description: Classic dried cannabis flower—smoked or vaporized in a dry herb device.

name: Pre-Rolls
description: Ready-to-use joints filled with ground flower for convenience.

name: Vapes
description: Cartridges or disposable devices that vaporize cannabis oil for fast, convenient use.

name: Edibles
description: Gummies, chocolates, and other edible formats with a slower onset and longer duration.

name: Concentrates
description: Highly concentrated extracts designed for experienced shoppers and specific devices.

name: Nano Powders
description: Fast-mix powders designed to dissolve into beverages—often with a quicker onset than traditional edibles.
